main event: Air crew members sighted a bright light at an estimated distance of 30 miles NNE of San Juan.
interesting points: The sighting occurred around 0330Z on 09/28/62,The MARS crew also reported an observation at 1910Z,There were two sightings that are probably related,The first observation was described as a bright light and the second might have been a meteorite,The report indicated characteristics consistent with meteor observations.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
